Room Features

The City View Two Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and feature two four-fixture bathrooms. These 1150 square foot Suites are situated on floors 5 to 14. 

Bed & Bath Experience

The City View Two Bedroom Suite offers spectacular views of Manhattan’s Upper East Side. The small foyer opens to an elegantly designed living room that features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar.  There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

The suites are comprised of two bedrooms. The master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two nightstands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. A 40” TV and console is located across from the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.

The second bedroom is comprised of twin beds. The room features a nightstand between the two beds, Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar is located across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.

Our service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 4 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
